The license agreements for each component in this folder are:

1. jQueryUI: MIT
	http://jqueryui.com/about/

2. My97DatePicker: Custom
	http://www.my97.net/dp/license.asp

3. UMEditor: MIT
	http://ueditor.baidu.com/website/index.html

4. UEditor: MIT
	http://ueditor.baidu.com/website/index.html

5. CKEditor: GPL, LGPL, MPL
	http://ckeditor.com/about

6. TinyMCE: LGPL
	http://www.tinymce.com/
	
7. Spectrum: Custom
	https://github.com/bgrins/spectrum

8. ECharts: BSD 3-Clause License
	http://echarts.baidu.com/
